main event: A C-47 pilot observed an unidentified object near Vichy, Missouri, that appeared as a light changing color and intensity.
interesting points: The object varied in color from red to green and had a pulsating motion., The sighting lasted for almost one hour., The object was tracked at an altitude of 7000 feet and an indicated airspeed of 370 knots., The reliability of the witness was rated as excellent., No physical evidence of the sighting was found.
sighted object: a light varying in intensity and color
